products.title: Harewood Plain Red Roller Blind
products.description: Our harewood plain is a premium quality 100% polyester fabric. It can be manufactured as both vertical or roller blinds and is suitable for use throughout the home and conservatory. With its seductive colour palette and attractive prices harewood is one of their bestselling plain ranges. Buy it for your home today we're sure you'll love it. The popular harewood plain red roller blind now comes with free delivery on orders over 145.

products.title: Harewood Blackout Red Roller Blind
products.description: Our harewood blackout is a premium quality 100% polyester fabric. It can be manufactured as both vertical or roller blinds and is suitable for use throughout the home and conservatory. With the added benefit of its colour matched blackout backing and attractive prices harewood blackout is one of their bestselling blackout ranges. Buy it for your home today we're sure you'll love it. The brightly coloured harewood blackout red roller blind adds colour to any room.
